item.description:
Agenda

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what your promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

Did you know that well dressed women are seen as credible, capable, intelligent, and self-confident?  First impressions are so important and our clothes can have a powerful impact on how we are perceived by others. 

Join Fashion Coach Susan Kanoff and CAbi Fashion Consultant Cheryle Joyce, for tips on developing your best professional wardrobe.  With just a few key pieces, you will learn how to put together fabulous outfits that will make you stand out in the crowd.

 Cheryle Joyce holds a degree in Interior Design and worked in that field for many years. She has always had a love of fashion, truly enjoys helping women create new looks to complement their bodies and lifestyles and has been an Independent Consultant for Cabi  for three seasons.

 Fashion Coach Susan Kanoff helps women create a wardrobe that makes them look and feel great. In addition to her work with private clients, Susan participates in fashion events for stores and boutiques and frequently runs workshops for local groups and organizations. Susan also styles for television including New England Cable News (NECN) and PBS specials. She can be heard co-hosting The Clothes Line, an internet radio show focusing on style and fashion.

www.agreatnewlook.com

1:15  - 1:30 - Networking and Wrap up

 

There will be a table available for business cards and promotional materials.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
